Layer.OnCommand:
%function(self)
if tonumber(GAMESTATE:GetVersionDate()) >= 20170714 then --start,end,name,difficulty,color local mbc3_spellcards = { {0,36,'Firestopper',5,{1,.3,.5,1}}, {36,44,'(Freeform Jazz Music Stops)',6,{.7,.7,.7,1}}, {44,52,'Professional Courtesy',4,{.3,.6,1,1}}, {52,64,'Fly Away Now',5,{.45,.45,1,1}}, {64,72,'DYSCONTROLLED GALAXY',1,{.6,.3,1,1}}, {72,92,'Swop \'n\' drop',6,{.75,.15,1,1}}, {92,93,'Now Is A Dull TopScreen',4,{0,0,0,1}}, {98,102,'Warriors Foot Dive',4,{0,.5,1,1}}, {102,136,'Ayaslaughterer',7,{1,.8,.2,1}}, {136,152,'Blastix Riot Gear',6,{1,.5,0,1}}, {152,188,'12 Little Fragments of Timing Window',5,{.2,.2,.5,1}}, {188,196,'Yo that\'s sick',6,{.2,.4,1,1}}, {196,204,'This Clothes',5,{.3,.6,1,1}}, {204,216,'*Feels Sickness*',6,{.4,.8,1,1}}, {218,221,'The Haunted House Jump',10,{.1,.6,.8,1}}, {224,248,'Warriors Reboot',6,{0,1,.3,1}}, {256,272,'Warriors Threeboot',7,{1,0,.4,1}}, {272,284,'Seismic Activity',7,{.6,.2,1,1}}, {284,288,'Clouded Judgment',5,{.8,.35,1,1}}, {288,308,'Back The Fuck Away',4,{1,.5,1,1}}, {308,320,'The Sampling Paradise',6,{1,.3,.5,1}}, {320,344,'Blastix Riot Police',6,{1,.5,0,1}}, }
local s = GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSong()
--send spellcards if table.getn(mbc3_spellcards) ~= 0 then
s:SetNumSpellCards(table.getn(mbc3_spellcards)) for i=1,table.getn(mbc3_spellcards) do local a = mbc3_spellcards[i] s:SetSpellCardTiming(i-1,a[1],a[2]) s:SetSpellCardName(i-1,a[3]) s:SetSpellCardDifficulty(i-1,a[4]) s:SetSpellCardColor(i-1,a[5][1],a[5][2],a[5][3],a[5][4]) end end end end
